description:
UberSocial: Everything you want from your Twitter app and more!

***** 

Here’s what people are saying:

“Access to your own superhero social network utility belt packed with simple, yet brilliant features. Pow! … This really is the Twitter client that has thought of everything.” – KnowYourApps.com

“It’s the best Twitter platform on the market to date” – NightmairCreative.com
 
******

UberSocial is a powerful yet simple Twitter client that brings fun and functionality to your Twitter experience. Check out some of our exclusive features:

NEXT GENERATION TIMELINE:
- UberBar: a movable, hide-able menu that puts all functionality at your fingertips.
- UberTabs: compose a Tweet or view your notifications with one click.
- Swipe through all your UberSocial screens with one touch

RICH MEDIA TIMELINE:
- LiveLinks makes all URLs, @usernames and #hashtags directly clickable on your timeline!
- View images right in the timeline. 
- Auto-expand with just one click.
- Play YouTube videos within your timeline!

ADVANCED TWEET COMPOSER:
- Tweet “Now Playing” or last photo taken with easy shortcuts
- Friend and Hashtag picker to easily grow your followers
- Choose from dozens of emoticons right in the compose screen
- Cross-post to Facebook with one easy click

CUSTOM FEATURES:
- Picture Stream lets you view only rich media tweets
- Inner Circle: customize your in-crowd and see just their tweets.
- Built-in tweet extender lets you say everything you want to beyond 140 characters.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL
- If you love Hootsuite then you’ll love UberSocial! Connect multiple Twitter accounts; switch between them easily
- Manage and edit your profile 
- Advanced search and trending screens
- Sound effects

For more information about UberSocial, please visit: http://support.ubersocial.com/
